title: Kyoufu Shinbun
synopsis: For reasons unknown to him, Rei receives the Kyoufu Shinbun every morning, a newspaper which foresees deaths and catastrophes...
staff: [['Annou, Takashi', ['Director']], ['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Sakurai, Masaaki', ['Script']], ['Tsunoda, Jirou', ['Original Creator']]]
